content.body: the Rust RFC process suggests "pre-discussing" RFCs on their forums, maybe it's an idea to have a "test262" area of https://es.discourse.group/ ?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: the Rust RFC process suggests "pre-discussing" RFCs on their forums, maybe it's an idea to have a "test262" area of https://es.discourse.group/ ?

content.body: Is there enough interest in test262 to warrant that? Totally fine to create it tho
probably not immediately, but if we get uptake of the RFC process and more community involvement, we might find it's useful
